name: Mehrak's Assistance
description:
The character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG, and the Physical DMG they deal is converted to Dendro DMG. 
After the character uses a Normal Attack: Create a Burst Scan.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: The character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG, and the $[K100] they deal is converted to $[K107]. \n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Create a $[K1033].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
